CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 850 nm in PDTP - DTBT and ca.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 850 nm |
| PDTP |
| DTBT |

Explanation:

The given paragraph does not contain any other material names apart from "850 nm", "PDTP", and "DTBT". Therefore, these are the valid material names to be identified from the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 850 nm |
| PDTP |
| DTBT |

Explanation:

The given paragraph only contains entities that refer to material names. Therefore, all the entities in the paragraph are valid material names. There are no entities that do not clearly refer to material names in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 850 nm in PDTP - DTBT and ca.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 850 nm |
| PDTP |
| DTBT |
| ca. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 850 nm wavelength |
| PDTP (Photonic Drop-Tower Transfer Platform) |
| DTBT (Dip-coating with Transfer by Bubble Trap) |
| ca. (approximately) |

Note: The entities "ca." and "approximately" are included as they can be considered as properties of the quantitative value "850 nm wavelength" implying an uncertainty or approximation.
